interlinear-text.item: MSK iʃqət də ʐɨ pzɨv tu kart

phrase.item: You put love in my heart, you were my teacher, oh flower.
I was unaware of the world, you educated me, oh flower.
I learned to burn in love, [like a] moth around a candle.
I knew only happiness, and you taught me sorrow.
I learned to have patience, because of your careless heart.
All day long I shed tears because of your dry eyes.
No matter how far I am now, you are close to my heart.
But in this ephemeral life, death is closer to me than you.
